question: I qualify for monthly premium reductions, but I chose to pay my full monthly premium instead. Can I claim the amount of reduced premiums during tax time when I file my taxes?
text:
I qualify for monthly premium reductions, but I chose to pay my full monthly premium instead. Can I claim the amount of reduced premiums during tax time when I file my taxes?
          
        
Yes, when you file your
taxes  tax credits that you did not receive throughout the year will be paid back to you as a refund
when you file and reconcile your taxes on your federal income tax return
.
